imgDesc.text: These Manifestation Mechanisms require you to bring a nearby Signal Spirit near to them within a time limit after they are activated, and they will be marked by a pillar of light at this time. There might be some unexpected reward upon reaching the final Manifestation Mechanism.

These Manifestation Mechanisms require you to bring a nearby Signal Spirit near to them within a time limit after they are activated, and they will be marked by a pillar of light at this time. There might be some unexpected reward upon reaching the final Manifestation Mechanism.
